description: bandwidht usage data is incompletely updated in database, resulting in only one of the data being reported in case there are two different mac addresses
title: bandwidht usage data is incompletely updated in database

comments.content: bandwidht usage data is incompletely updated in database, resulting in only one of the data being reported in case there are two different mac addresses

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/9467

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/9467
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/642ec634c3beeb69175d0df12bcec8833e7efae5
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 642ec634c3beeb69175d0df12bcec8833e7efae5
Author: Nikhil Komawar <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Jul 6 18:22:56 2012 -0400

    Implements updating complete bw usage data
    
    the DB query is not filtering by the mac address.
    Hence, only one of them was being updated and
    with mismatched bw usage info.
    
    fixes bug 1021961
    
    Change-Id: I792493a6e0817d62bbf6955df9cd5bc0e4af9dbb
